column1: Oroqen Autonomous Banner (Mongolian: ᠣᠷᠴᠣᠨ ᠤ ᠥᠪᠡᠷᠲᠡᠭᠡᠨ ᠵᠠᠰᠠᠬᠤ ᠬᠣᠰᠢᠭᠤ
column3: Mongolian Cyrillic: Орчон өөртөө засах хошуу; Simplified Chinese: 鄂伦春自治旗
column4: Pinyin: Èlúnchūn Zìzhìqí) is an autonomous banner that lies directly south of the urban district of Hailar in the prefecture-level city of Hulunbuir. It covers an area  of 60
column6: 312 sq mi). As of the 2010 census
column8: 752 inhabitants with a population density of 4.84 inhabitants per km². Its capital is the town of Alihe (阿里河镇). It includes Ganhe (甘河)
column10: Jiwen (吉文) but excludes the Jiagedaqi and Songling Districts.
